Description: The cmdlet 'New-AzureRmDnsRecordSet' no longer supports the type 'System.UInt32' for parameter 'Ttl'.
Remediation: Change the type for parameter 'Ttl' back to 'System.UInt32'.

Description: The parameter set '__AllParameterSets' for cmdlet 'New-AzureRmDnsRecordSet' has been removed.
Remediation: Add parameter set '__AllParameterSets' back to cmdlet 'New-AzureRmDnsRecordSet'.
